@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Fx/@24944
sname
endOpacity
stype
number
sgroup
Fx
Sdescription
#$@text#$@
Only applicable for <a href="output/Ext.Fx.html#Ext.Fx-fadeIn" ext:member="fadeIn" ext:cls="Ext.Fx">fadeIn</a> or <a href="output/Ext.Fx.html#Ext.Fx-fadeOut" ext:member="fadeOut" ext:cls="Ext.Fx">fadeOut</a>, a number between
<tt>0</tt> and <tt>1</tt> inclusive to configure the ending opacity value.
#$@text#$@

@xworker.html.extjs.Ext.Fx/@24946
sname
scope
sdescriptors
xworker.lang.MetaDescriptor3/@thing
sextends
childDescriptor
smany
true
seditCols
2
sinitialization
false
smodifier
public
sdescription
The scope (<code>this</code> reference) in which the <tt><a href="output/Ext.Fx.html#Ext.Fx-callback" ext:member="callback" ext:cls="Ext.Fx">callback</a></tt> function is executed. Defaults to the browser window.
